title: CureVac Shelves Covid-19 Vaccine, Focuses on Next-Generation Shot
sub_head: Vaccine developers shift focus to variants, boosters as initial market looks to close to new entrants
body:
Germanyâ€™s CureVac NV said it would shelve its most advanced Covid-19 vaccine and focus on a new version, in the latest sign that efforts to develop vaccines against the virus are entering a new phase, centered on next-generation shots.
The initial rush of pandemic vaccine development appears to have ended with only a handful of clear winners, immunization drives across the Western world are dominated by shots made by Pfizer Inc. with partner BioNTech SE , AstraZeneca PLC and Moderna Inc. The field may be narrowing further as dozens of countries now clamor for supplies of the Pfizer vaccine, drawn by its high level of efficacy and a lack of concerns over rare side effects.
